Hi there just decided to try the demo.

just wondering, whats the difference between demo and full version?

 ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Welcome to the Forums!

The full version has a new terrain, the ability to save your missions, the ability to keep them in orbit when you start a new game (persistence), a plugin loader, which allows for autopilots, new UI\'s and much more! The .15 update will bring a spaceplane hangar and patched conics, among other things.

-Radion Spaceworks

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

today i didnt have a happy launch ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

for me, on lowest settings everything is fine, untill i launch.

when i launch and fly, i get MEGA LAG.

why???

this is annyoing as hell. >![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Maybe you put a lot of engines? You can never have too many boosters, but be careful of the lag. Even for very good computers, this game is just very taxing to your computer. You may want to upgrade your PC. Don\'t play this game on a laptop if you do.
